structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.history: Repealed 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 14, effective April 11, 2012. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 55, effective January 1, 2011. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 9. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 205, sec. 13.
